item.description:
Chris Botti is coming to Rockport Music!
November 3, 2012 as part of Rockport Music’s Annual Fundraiser
Jazz on the Rocks – Take 3! This is a live ticketed event.

5:30 pm Pre-Concert cocktail & hors d’oeuvres Reception
6:00 pm Exclusive Live Auction
8:00 pm Concert by Grammy-nominated trumpeter Chris Botti

Tickets still available! For information please go to:
http://rockportmusic.org/Support/fundraising-events.html

Also, please check out our Online Auction supporting this event at
www.biddingforgood.com/rockportmusic
for the chance to bid on over 100 items (new items added daily) including,
Restaurant Gift Cards, Special Travel Packages, Hotel Accommodations,
and many more unique and one of a kind experiences.
All right in time for the Holiday Season!

The Online Auction opens on October 23
Please be ready by signing in and creating an account!
item.name: Come to Rockport On November 3 to see Chris Botti!
